Item ID6924

The infinity bottoms are a magic armour item obtained from the infinity robes set worn in the legwear slot. 50 Magic and 25 Defence is required to wear the infinity bottom.

The infinity bottom can be obtained as a reward in the Mage Training Arena minigame for:

Amount Task
450 Telekinetic pizazz points
500 Alchemist pizazz points
5000 Enchantment pizazz points
450 Graveyard pizazz points

It can be stored in a magic wardrobe in a player owned house.

A light or dark infinity colour kit can be combined with infinity bottoms to make light or dark infinity bottoms, respectively. This is a cosmetic enhancement and does not change the stats in any way.

 Attack bonuses

[[File:Infinity bottoms detail.png|75px|left]]
The '''infinity bottoms''' are a [[Armour#Magic armour|magic armour]] [[item]] obtained from the [[infinity robes]] set worn in the legwear slot. 50 [[Magic]] and 25 [[Defence]] is required to wear the infinity bottom. 

The infinity bottom can be obtained as a reward in the [[Mage Training Arena]] [[minigame]] for:
{|class="wikitable"
!Amount
!Task
|-
|450
|Telekinetic pizazz points
|-
|500
|Alchemist pizazz points
|-
|5000
|Enchantment pizazz points
|-
|450
|Graveyard pizazz points
|}

It can be stored in a [[magic wardrobe]] in a player owned house. 

A [[Light infinity colour kit|light]] or [[dark infinity colour kit]] can be combined with infinity bottoms to make [[Light infinity bottoms|light]] or [[dark infinity bottoms]], respectively. This is a cosmetic enhancement and does not change the stats in any way.
